name: Colombia NEWIES Day
shortDescription: Are you new at our subdivision or even into the network as a controller or as a pilot, this event is focused on you! This is a ceremony for all those new members in our country. This is a Warm welcome to the VATSIM Colombia Family.
description: This event is created as a ceremony for all those new controllers and pilots in our subdivision and outside there who have just obtained their ranks or which are doing their first steps on VATSIM. This is an invitation to be part of VATSIM ColombiaÂ´s family. Let us be part of your story as a virtual pilot and controller.

name: Pulkovo online day
shortDescription: Welcome to Saint Petersburg!
description:
Dear friends,


We are glad to invite you to join Pulkovo online day and visit the Northern capital of Russia!


On Thursday, December 28, from 16 to 20z we will be happy to provide your flight with ATC to make it pleasant.


See you soon at Pulkovo!

name: Moscow Online Evening
shortDescription: Moscow Air Traffic Control Center is glad to invite you to our regular online day!
description:
Dear pilots,


Moscow Air Traffic Control Center is glad to invite you to our regular online day!


December, 28th fly to Moscow airports - Sheremetyevo (UUEE), Domodedovo (UUDD) and Vnukovo (UUWW).
Our neighbouring Saint Petersburg FIR will be also online from 16 till 20 UTC.


See you!

name: Nairobi Nights
shortDescription: Join us for our recurring edition of Nairobi Nights! Fly in and out of Nairobi Jomo Kenyatta, perhaps fancy a long haul from Europe, or a nice short domestic hop to Tanzania? We've got you covered!
description:
Join us for our recurring edition of Nairobi Nights! Fly in and out of Nairobi Jomo Kenyatta, perhaps fancy a long haul from Europe, or a nice short domestic hop to Tanzania? We've got you covered!

name: [IST_APP] | S3 Exam
shortDescription: Help Kai get his S3 rating on IST_APP, which covers Istanbul TMA on 28 Dec 2023 between 18z - 20z!
description: Help Kai get his S3 rating on IST_APP, which covers Istanbul TMA on 28 Dec 2023 between 18z - 20z! All VFR and IFR flights welcome!

name: Welcome to HEL
shortDescription: VATSIM Scandinavia and Finland invite you to enjoy our weekly event, Welcome to HEL. Helsinki Airport will be fully staffed by our air traffic controllers every Thursday 1800z-2100z.
description:
VATSIM Scandinavia and Finland invite you to enjoy our weekly event, Welcome to HEL. Helsinki will be fully staffed by our air traffic controllers every Thursday 1800z-2100z.


A rapidly growing team of controllers is looking forward to guiding you into Helsinki Airport (EFHK). Helsinki Control (EFIN_CTR) will also provide top-down service all across Finnish airspace. We guarantee professional, flexible and friendly service across the entirety of Finland.


See you on Thursday!


Briefing and Charts

name: VATBRZ New Year Event!
shortDescription: Fly between Salvador (SBSV) and Recife (SBRF), and celebrate the beginning of a new year with us. Let's take off towards a 2024 full of adventures!
description:
Countdown to the New Year with VATSIM Brasil!


Join us at the "VATBRZ New Year" event on Thursday 28/12, from 19 to 22z.


Fly between Salvador (SBSV) and Recife (SBRF), and celebrate the beginning of a new year with us. Let's take off towards a 2024 full of adventures!

airports.name: Deputado Luiz Eduardo Magalhaes International Airport

name: [SKSM] Dangerous â Approaches: Santa Marta Edition 💥
shortDescription:
From "The City of Eternal Spring". The center of Colombia joins with "The Pearl of America".
Enjoy the sensation of flying between mountains and arriving at the most beautiful Bay in Colombia: Santa Marta.
description:
For This challenge we have the RNP AR Approach to RUNWAY 19 in SKSM, kinda crazy, huh?


As difficult as it may seem, this is a challenge for controllers and pilots... the gap with the mountains is very small and also the procedures will be so tight, also taking into account that after landing we will have to perform a backtrack, while several planes are approaching to the airport, and the best! A runway of only 1700m.


Our best Controllers will be waiting to offer you the best experience this afternoon.


For this challenge we recommend medium and light aircraft such as the A320 and B737 family, due to the airport's infrastructure.


You can find the Colombian charts on: https://eaip-colombia.atnaerocivil.gov.co/eaip/AIRAC%20AMDT%2065-23_2023_05_18/index.html

name: Thursdays in Toronto
shortDescription: Fly in or out of Toronto every Thursdays as we staff up Toronto! Both IFR and VFR are welcomed.
description: Fly in or out of Toronto every Thursdays as we staff up Toronto! Both IFR and VFR are welcomed.

name: Acropolis Nights
shortDescription: Join us every Friday for a breathtaking experience over the iconic city of Athens. Acropolis Nights, hosted by Hellenic vACC, is your weekly opportunity to immerse yourself in the magic of aviation and explore Athens like never before! See you there!
description: Join us every Friday for a breathtaking experience over the iconic city of Athens. Acropolis Nights, hosted by Hellenic vACC, is your weekly opportunity to immerse yourself in the magic of aviation and explore Athens like never before. Our experienced controllers will make sure to provide you with full ATC coverage over Athens International Airport ''Eleftherios Venizelos" whilst you enjoy the spectacular views over the Acropolis. So what are you waiting for? Mark your calendars and we will see you in our virtual skies!

name: Discover Romania
shortDescription: Your last chance to fly into Romanian airspace with full ATC in 2023. Every Friday, we open the gates to three more airports, just for YOU. So, let's go on an adventure and Discover Romania!
description:
vACC Romania invite pilots to the "Discover Romania" event! Picture this: any Romanian airport opened for 3 hours of realistic control, every Friday evening starting at 18 UTC. You can take off and land from anywhere you fancy. The key? Exploring the beauty of Romania! See you there!


Charts and Sceneries

name: [CYVR_TWR] | S2 Exam
shortDescription: Come on over to the West Coast and help Tristan earn his S2 rating. IFR and VFR coming and going to and from CYVR are all welcome!
description: Come on over to the West Coast and help Tristan earn his S2 rating. IFR and VFR coming and going to and from CYVR are all welcome!

shortDescription: The Indonesia vACC and the Hong Kong vACC have come together to present you this one-way expedition from the Indonesian Capital of Jakarta to the hectic night city of Hong Kong . Fly the retreat one-way as we traverse the resplendent night skies of southeast Asia.

The sky awaits.

name: Dammam Live
shortDescription: Prepare for an unforgettable virtual aviation experience as VATSIM Saudi Arabia proudly presents "Dammam Live". Join us on Saturday, the 30th of December, from 15:00z to 18:00z for an immersive journey through the bustling skies of the Middle East.
description:
VATSIM Saudi Arabia presents "Dammam Live


Prepare for an unforgettable virtual aviation experience as VATSIM Saudi Arabia proudly presents "Dammam Live", an event set against the stunning backdrop of King Fahd International Airport (OEDF) in Dammam. Join us on Saturday, the 30th of December, from 15:00z to 18:00z for an immersive journey through the bustling skies of the Middle East.


King Fahd International Airport, one of the busiest airports in the region, will be the focal point of this event. Experience the sophistication of Dammam's air traffic operations as you navigate through its stunning surroundings.


Our dedicated team of air traffic controllers will be on hand to provide professional and realistic services throughout the event, ensuring a seamless and immersive experience for all pilots.


Whether you're a seasoned virtual pilot or just starting your journey, Dammam Live offers a variety of flight opportunities suitable for all skill levels. Choose from a range of domestic and international routes, each carefully curated to provide a diverse and challenging flying experience.



  • Date and Time: Saturday, 30th December

  • Duration: 15:00z - 18:00z

  • Airport: King Fahd International Airport (OEDF), Dammam


How to Participate
Pilots: Prepare your virtual aircraft, file your flight plans, and join us on VATSIM for an unforgettable adventure. Ensure your simulator is updated with the latest navigation data for a truly realistic experience.
Air Traffic Controllers: If you have a passion for controlling virtual airspace, we invite you to join our dedicated team of controllers. Help create a smooth and realistic environment for pilots as they navigate the skies around Dammam.


Join Dammam Live and soar to new heights in the virtual skies. Are you ready for the challenge?

name: Cape Town Sunsets
shortDescription: It doesn't matter if you're on a long haul flight from Dubai or London or just a short flight from Durban, Windhoek or Johannesburg. Come enjoy the sunset in Cape Town and relax after a loooong day. The ILS is waiting for you... but how about them RNAV approaches?
description: It doesn't matter if you're on a long haul flight from Dubai or London or just a short flight from Durban, Windhoek or Johannesburg. Come enjoy the sunset in Cape Town and relax after a loooong day. The ILS is waiting for you... but how about them RNAV approaches?

name: GTOUT Of 2023
shortDescription: 2023 is coming to a close. Lets fly in or GTOUT of MCO! Join the Jacksonville ARTCC on Saturday December 30th from 23:59Z-04:00Z as we present, "GTOUT Of 2023, A New Year's Celebration" @ KMCO!
description: 2023 is coming to a close. Lets fly in or GTOUT of MCO! Join the Jacksonville ARTCC on Saturday December 30th from 23:59Z-04:00Z as we present, "GTOUT Of 2023, A New Year's Celebration" @ KMCO!

name: Non-Normal Night Shift Presents: New Years Eve!
shortDescription:
Time to celebrate 2023 and look forward to 2024 with one last Night Shift with extended hours!


Tonight we will be running coverage over the entire NZZC and whilst we finish up officially at 10.30 pm we are looking to extend both flying and controlling as long as we can.
description:
Kia Ora All


Time to celebrate 2023 and look forward to 2024 with one last Night Shift with extended hours!


Tonight we will be running coverage over the entire NZZC and whilst we finish up officially at 10.30 pm we are looking to extend both flying and controlling as long as we can unofficially to see in the new year. So jump on frequency, or pop over to Discord and celebrate the new year with VATNZ.


Controllers can take their pick of any positions they're rated to staff. Pilots can choose any flight or flights they want to take. Any aircraft type from any location!


The goal is to cover as much of the country as possible with ATC service, and the challenge is then to our pilots to keep the controllers busy all evening both officially and unofficially until midnight.


See you all New Years Eve on Sunday!

name: Adria New Year Party
shortDescription: Welcome to Adria New Year party - lasting for full 12 hours! Expect many airports around 6 FIRs Adria is covering or a complete top-down service provided, wherever you decide to go! Happy New Year and let us celebrate together!
description:
Welcome to Adria New Year party - lasting for full 12 hours! Expect many airports around 6 FIRs Adria is covering or a complete top-down service provided, wherever you decide to go! Happy New Year and let us celebrate together!


Expect most of the airports around Adria to be open at various times during the day. For up-to-date availability do check our Discord channel.


Once again, happy New Year - let us start it together in Adria!

airports.name: Ohrid St. Paul the Apostle Airport

name: Vienna Trainee-Night
shortDescription: We invite you to join our "Trainee-Night" on every second Monday! During this time, we will be staffing our Training-Airport Vienna (LOWW) and make sure to have as many of our Trainees as possible on our frequencies!
description:
Dear pilots!
We invite you to join our "Trainee-Night" every second Monday! During this time we will be staffing our Training-Airport Vienna (LOWW) and make sure to have as many of our Trainees as possible on our frequencies! Take the chance to support us in training our controllers by visiting one of the airports, no matter if you fly VFR or IFR and enjoy the additional opportunity to visit Vienna during full staffing! Our trainees will be glad to be provided with a lot of traffic to get their controlling to the next level!
We are looking forward to welcoming you!
Charts and Briefing: Charts | Briefing
See you in the skies!

name: DÃ¼sseldorf Monday
shortDescription: We open our training airport DÃ¼sseldorf (EDDL) from ground to center for you every week and you are cordially invited to your flight.
description:
No matter whether you want to explore the beautiful Rhineland and Ruhr area by VFR or whether you want to start or end an IFR short, medium or long-haul flight.


Discover the versatility of the airport from a different angle and have a look.


We hope to hear you on our frequency.

name: Vectors to Copenhagen
shortDescription: Come and get vectors to the final in Copenhagen! We are ready once again on Monday from 18z with full staffing.
description:
VATSIM Scandinavia and Copenhagen FIR extend a warm invitation to our enhanced weekly event, Vectors to Copenhagen! Brace yourself for three action-packed hours of full staffing, running from 18z to 21z. Our team of controllers is geared up to guide you seamlessly into the captivating capital of Denmark.


Embark on your flight ahead of time for a picturesque landing in Copenhagen, allowing for a leisurely turnaround with ample time to jet back. Alternatively, flip the script and set out on a thrilling adventure from Copenhagen to explore Europe's stunning landscapes. With three hours at your disposal, you can traverse multiple scenic destinations. But beware! The later you join, the more intense the aerial traffic will become!


Ensure your charts are in check, dust off your aircraft from the hangar, and mark your presence at this electrifying event. We look forward to seeing you in the virtual skies!


Briefings, Charts and everything you need to know is here!


Check the ATC bookings here

name: Late Nights at ZOA
shortDescription:
On Monday, January 1, 2024 7:00 PM PT, ZOA will staff SFO, OAK, and SJC until January 1, 2024 10:00 PM PT!


Late Night at ZOA will occur on the first Monday, second Tuesday, third Wednesday, fourth Thursday, and (sometimes) fifth Monday of every month for the foreseeable future.
description:
It's late in the evening on a weeknight in the U.S. and you ask yourself, "where can I get guaranteed ATC service for the next three hours?" You look at your monitor and notice a neon sign: "Oakland - Late Night." And then it hits you... 🌛


The Oakland ARTCC is proud to present its experimental event series, Late Night at ZOA. Each week, we will be staffing a series of airports during the time when most people on the East Coast have already gotten in bed. Unlike most weekly staff-ups, this weekly event will occur on a different day (almost) every week.


On Monday, January 1, 2024 7:00 PM PT (Jan. 2, 0300z), ZOA will staff SFO, OAK, and SJC until January 1, 2024 10:00 PM PT (Jan. 2, 0600z)!


Late Night at ZOA will occur on the first Monday, second Tuesday, third Wednesday, fourth Thursday, and (sometimes) fifth Monday of every month for the foreseeable future. Come join us for some late night shenanigans.

airports.name: Norman Y. Mineta San Jose International Airport

shortDescription: See and touch the magic of Lapland every Tuesday during the winter! Three of Lapland's biggest airports are fully staffed and serving virtual Lapland travelers the whole winter season!

name: Hogmanay Fly In
shortDescription: VATSIM UK is pleased to announce itâs annual Hogmanay Fly In event on the 2nd January. Come and celebrate the new year as we open many of Scotland's airports between 1800-2200z.
description: A celebration that started in Yorkshire in 1443, before starting in Scotland in 1604. Originating from the Norwegians and Vikings as a substitute for Christmas or the âDaft Daysâ. VATSIM UK is pleased to announce itâs annual Hogmanay Fly In event on the 2nd January. Come and celebrate the new year as we open many of Scotland's airports between 1800-2200z.

name: Northern Lights Tuesdays
shortDescription: Get to your de-icing pads and join us in the far north for some frontier flying in the Great White North between Fort MacMurray, Yellowknife, and Edmonton.
description: Join us for our #NorthernLightsTuesdays as we light up the Arctic and Edmonton FIR. Northern Lights Tuesdays gives you excellent ATC coverage between Yellowknife, Fort MacMurray and Edmonton (the Gateway to the North) and helps us train our ATC Students.

name: [ESGG_TWR] | S2 Exam
shortDescription: Melvin is having his S2 check at ESGG on the 3rd of January 17,30-19,30z.
description:
Come and help Melvin prove his worthiness of the S2 rating. Take out your small propeller aircraft, helicopter, or jet aircraft and fly to/from ESGG either IFR och VFR.


Charts can be found here: https://aro.lfv.se/Editorial/View/IAIP?folderId=31

name: Slovak Online Day
shortDescription: Why not come to Slovakia to have a good Air Traffic Services for your flight in Bratislava FIR? We guarantee you, we won't let you down, all we can do is help! So come to Bratislava FIR to have some fun!
description:
Why not come to Slovakia to have a good Air Traffic Services for your flight in Bratislava FIR? We guarantee you, we won't let you down, all we can do is help! So come to Bratislava FIR to have some fun!


About Slovak Online Day:


-Starting event from 18:00z to 21:00z every Wednesday


-Full ATC coverage in Slovakia


-Friendly Slovak controllers will take you safely to your destinations


For sceneries and charts, visit http://vacc-slovakia.sk/


See you in there !

name: VACC-Austria Weekly Wednesday
shortDescription: Weekly Wednesday - every Wednesday - 1830-2130z - FULL ATC in Austria
description:
Enjoy extended coverage of FULL ATC across the entire country. Take your favourite aircraft out of the hanger for a spin to our majors Vienna (LOWW) and/or the infamous Innsbruck Airport (LOWI). Alternatively enjoy a flight to our breath-taking minors: Salzburg (LOWS), Graz (LOWG), Klagenfurt (LOWK) or Linz (LOWL). Of course, we are providing full CPDLC and PDC service along the way!


Take a break from your busy schedule and enjoy an evening with 3 hours of guaranteed ATC-service "as real as it gets"! We are very excited to welcome you to one of our airports!

name: Roma Nights
shortDescription: Dear pilots, VATITA is welcoming you all to fly in the Rome FIR, where we'll offer just the best of services, from the top to the bottom, also covering the airports of Fiumicino (LIRF) and Ciampino (LIRA).
description:
Dear pilots, VATITA is welcoming you all to fly in the Rome FIR, where we'll offer just the best of services, from the top to the bottom, covering the airports of Fiumicino (LIRF) and Ciampino (LIRA).


Pick your favorite plane, and fly in and out of our beautiful country, maybe connecting with our dear neighbors!
Theres something for everyone, so contact Roma on 124.200!


LIRF Pilot Briefing, sceneries and charts
